item.description:
NE Revolution VS. D.C. United

Thanks to member David for offering up the free tickets. Buy this man another beer! This a cross-group event. Come join other members of these fun groups:

Beantown and Beyond 20-40 Something Singles
The Metro West 30's to 40's Singles Meetup Group


Meeting up: We'll head inside around 7:00-7:15. Kickoff is at 7:30.

UPDATE 8-19-08: I am not making arrangements for tailgaiting. Please post your interest in the discussion below.


  • Everyone should park in the GREEN tailgaiting area on the map all the way at the back center lot.
  • Meetup time is anywhere from 5:30 to 7 when we'll start walking over to the stadium.
  • I will email my and David's cell number.
  • Your patience and flexibility is appreciated.


Map of Gillette Stadium Parking
item.how_to_find_us: See my pic. Green parking area on the map. Tan Mazda Tribute with Meetup Sign
item.name: NE Revolution Soccer Game
